definition: To bring into existence or create something, often referring to the act of making or producing something new, such as a work of art, a piece of literature, or a technological invention. It is commonly used to describe the process of giving life to an idea or concept through creative means.

examples.german: Er hat eine neue Welt erschaffen.
examples.english: He has created a new world.
Together we can create great things.

examples.german: Er hat eine einzigartige Musik erschaffen.
Die Firma hat innovative Produkte erschaffen.
examples.english: The company has created innovative products.
